extendedIngredients.name: coconut flakes
extendedIngredients.originalString: Optional chopped pineapple or coconut flakes for garnish

extendedIngredients.name: greek yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 5.3 oz container Coconut Greek yogurt (I used Yoplait Greek)

extendedIngredients.name: milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ c milk, plus more, if needed for serving
metaInformation: plus more, if needed for serving

recipes.title: Pina Colada Overnight Oats
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, stir together both flavors of Greek yogurt, milk, and rum extract.Stir in the oats.Divide between two bowls and store in the refrigerator overnight to allow oats to soften.In the morning, add additional milk, if desired, to achieve preferred consistency, and serve with chopped pineapple or coconut flakes, if desired.

steps.step: In a bowl, stir together both flavors of Greek yogurt, milk, and rum extract.Stir in the oats.Divide between two bowls and store in the refrigerator overnight to allow oats to soften.In the morning, add additional milk, if desired, to achieve preferred consistency, and serve with chopped pineapple or coconut flakes, if desired.
